June 9, 1924 D Southern Counties Association Contest (2nd Section)
Southern Counties Association Contest (2nd Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Southern Counties Association Contest southern-counties-association-contest-2nd-section
None
William Tell [unknown arranger]
Football Ground, Horsham, Sussex First prize £7 and the “Finch” Challenge Cup : 2nd, £6; 3rd, £4.10s.; 4th, £3.
SPECIAL PRIZES Best Trombone (presented by Messrs. Boosey & Co., value £11.11s. Caterham. Best Soprano, Caterham (medal); solo cornet, West Crawley (medal); euphonium, Caterham (medal).
June 20, 2014, 2:29 p.m. June 20, 2014, 3:22 p.m.
1 Caterham E. W. Miles
2 West Crawley W. M. Smith
3 Sandhurst Silver Fred Bennellick
4 Orpington British Legion Christian Chantler Snr
